name: Error Ware 2
description:
Error Ware 2 is the long awaited sequel to U-GameZ's micro game fest "Error Ware" with more mini games, improved graphics, music & sound and even more fun!

Features
  • Challenging gameplay with quick minigames in the spirit of Nintendo's Wario Ware and Konami's Bishi Bashi series
  • Playable with up to 4 friends locally, even with just one controller!
  • Supports keyboard & mouse, XBOX / PlayStation / Nintendo gamepads & even a Wii Remote with motion controls!
  • Text & voices in English, French & German
  • Colorful visuals with catchy music, suitable for the whole family
  • Tons of unlockable stuff, like 16bit style "Error Boy" games

The full version of the game is expected to be released some time in 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018. Until then, enjoy the free demo!

I would really appreciate your feedback. Have a good time!
